Database models#

Database models implemented in the app.

class models.CartItem(**kwargs)#

CartItem database model.

id#

Cart_Item ID.

Type:

int, primary key

user_id#

ID of the user who is the cart item owner.

Type:

int

ticket_id#

Ticket ID.

Type:

int

quantity#

Quantity of tickets to purchase.

Type:

int

class models.Order(**kwargs)#

Order database model.

id#

Order ID.

Type:

int, primary key

user_id#

ID of the user who is the order owner.

Type:

int

total_amount#

Order amount in euros.

Type:

float

payment_method#

Payment method selected, available options are gotovina (cash) and kartica (credit card).

Type:

string

class models.OrderTicket(**kwargs)#

OrderTicket database model.

order_id#

Order ID.

Type:

int, primary key

ticket_id#

Ticket ID.

Type:

int, primary key

quantity#

Quantity of tickets to purchase.

Type:

int

class models.Ticket(**kwargs)#

Ticket database model.

id#

Ticket ID.

Type:

int, primary key

city#

City in which the ticket is applicable.

Type:

string

name#

Name of the public transport route the ticket applies to.

Type:

string

route#

Endpoints of the route.

Type:

string

total_seats#

Total number of seats in the public transport vehicle.

Type:

int

reserved_seats#

Number of reserved seats in the public transport vehicle.

Type:

int

price#

Ticket price.

Type:

float

class models.User(**kwargs)#

User database model.

id#

User ID.

Type:

int, primary key

firstname#

User’s first name.

Type:

string

lastname#

User’s last name.

Type:

string

email#

User’s email address.

Type:

string

password_hash#

User’s hashed password.

Type:

string

is_admin#

User’s administrator rights, default=False

Type:

bool

balance#

User’s account balance in euros, default = 0.0

Type:

float

check_password(password)#

Method for verifying a password hash.

Parameters:

password (string) – Password for verification.

Returns:

verification_result

Return type:

bool

load_user()#

Method for loading the user object from the database.

Parameters:

id (int) – User ID.

Returns:

database_result

Return type:

database_object | None

set_password(password)#

Method for generating a password hash.

Parameters:

password (string) – Password for hashing.

Return type:

None
